definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: The old bridge was last week .
sentences.chinese: 那座旧桥上个星期被拆除了。

sentences.english: He once again nosed ahead of me on the horse race last week.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期的马赛上，他又一次以微弱优势胜过了我。

sentences.english: Last week, Quick kept his promise.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期，魁克实现了他的承诺。

sentences.english: I was having English class at this time last week.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期的这个时间我都在上英语课。

sentences.english: A woman grieves near her relative's body after dozens of people were killed in landslides in China's Gansu province last week.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期，中国甘肃爆发泥石流，造成许多人死亡。

sentences.english: Art, I gave these out last Weds.
sentences.chinese: 我发出这些是在上个星期三。

sentences.english: Our family celebrated my grandparents' golden wedding anniversary in a big way last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期日，我家隆重庆祝了我祖父母的金婚纪念日。

sentences.english: Last Sunday, I went to the Book City to buy some books by bus.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期，我坐公车去书城去买几本书。

sentences.english: President Barack Obama called last week for Megrahi to be put under house arrest.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马总统上个星期呼吁把迈格拉希软禁在家。

sentences.english: Last week, I was looking in her mouth and decided to stick my tongue in it.
sentences.chinese: 而上个星期，我看着她的嘴，于是决定伸舌头进去。

sentences.english: Last week I visited the earthquake zone in Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期我访问了巴基斯坦的地震区。

sentences.english: Last week North Korea submitted a long-awaited document that listed its nuclear holdings.
sentences.chinese: 北韩上个星期提交了等待已久的北韩核项目清单。

sentences.english: That was the case of last week's rescue by four countries of the Benelux banks Dexia and Fortis.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期，四个国家向荷卢银行伸出了援手。

sentences.english: John's conversation with his teacher took place last Wednesday morning.
sentences.chinese: 约汉和他的老师的对话发生在上个星期三上午。

sentences.english: Last week he caught a robber in my father's shop.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期他在我爸爸的店里捉了一个贼。

sentences.english: Last week the ministry of public security ordered police to stop such practices.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期，公共安全部门勒令警方停止该行为。
